title: Pixel 4a 5G often has Poor Audio Quality on calls
content:
I'm now on my 2nd Pixel 4a 5G, and the audio quality on calls is often so bad
that I have to call back. A friend also on her 2nd Pixel 4a 5G has the same problem.
There are no apparent hardware problemsâ€”local music and sounds play fine.
I've followed the Nexus-Pixel from the original Nexus One,
but problems with the Pixel 4a 5G may finally drive me away.
I think it no coincidence that the trade press is reporting a decline in Pixel loyalty.
